commit message: Made use of proper android-number-morphing library. Removed duplicate stuff
Tweaked font sizes on different size devices
Optimization: only update date once per minute
Optimization: don't call System.currentTimeMillis as often
Fixed problem with gradients with times of day approaching dawn and dusk
Made time format respect 12/24 hour setting
Tweaked layouts for AppInfoView to work on all screen sizes
Made Daydream actually take the full screen including nav bar
Fixed auto hiding actionbar when screen first turns on and infoview is visible
Reduced CPU usage: don't tick or update the sky if the app is paused
Added solarpositioning library as a proper submodule
Removed solarpositioning source from main project
Fixed gradle build to compile solarpositioning subproject
Added Apache License to source files

Merge pull request #2 from RyDroid/fr

French translation

Merge pull request #1 from RyDroid/readme

Improvement of README
Lots of updates from a long time ago ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
